translations.text: Wa-izaa quri'al Quraanu fastami'oo lahoo Wa-ansitoo la-'allakum turhamoon

words.id: dan ingatlah||Tuhanmu||dalam||hatimu||merendahkan diri||dan rasa takut||dan tidak||keras||dari||perkataan/suara||diwaktu pagi||dan petang||dan jangan||kamu menjadi||dari||orang-orang yang lalai
words.en: And remember||your Lord||in||yourself||humbly||and (in) fear||and without||the loudness||of||[the] words||in the mornings||and (in) the evenings||And (do) not||be||among||the heedless

translations.text: Wazkur Rabbaka fee nafsika tadarru'anw Wa-kheefatanw Wa-doonal jahri minal qawli bilghuduwwi wal-aasali Wa-laa takum minal ghaafileen

words.id: sesungguhnya||malaikat-malaikat yang||disisi||Tuhanmu||tidak||menyombongkan diri||dari||beribadah kepadaNya||dan mereka mensucikanNya||dan kepadaNya||mereka bersujud
words.en: Indeed||those who||(are) near||your Lord||not||(do) they turn away in pride||from||His worship||And they glorify Him||and to Him||they prostrate

translations.text: innal lazeena inda Rabbika laa yastakbiroona 'an ibaadatihee Wa-yusabbihoonahoo Wa-lahoo yasjudoon
